name: Booking.com
description: One of the world's largest OTAs for accommodations, flights, car rentals, and attractions. Part of Booking Holdings.

name: Expedia.com
description: Major global OTA offering flights, hotels, car rentals, cruises, and vacation packages. Parent of many other travel brands.

name: TripAdvisor.com
description: Largest travel review and community site, with booking capabilities for hotels, flights, and attractions.

name: Google Flights
description: Powerful flight comparison tool integrated into Google Search, pulling data from airlines and OTAs.

name: Google Hotels
description: Hotel search and booking platform integrated into Google Search, comparing prices from various sources.

name: Airbnb.com
description: Leading platform for short-term home and apartment rentals, and experiences.

name: Kayak.com
description: Popular meta-search engine for flights, hotels, and car rentals. Owned by Booking Holdings.

name: Skyscanner.net
description: Global travel meta-search engine, strong for flexible date searches. Owned by Trip.com Group.

name: Agoda.com
description: OTA with a strong presence in Asia, offering hotels, flights, and airport transfers. Part of Booking Holdings.

name: Hotels.com
description: OTA focused on hotel bookings, known for its loyalty program. Part of Expedia Group.

name: Vrbo.com
description: Platform for vacation home rentals, primarily targeting families and groups. Part of Expedia Group.

name: Trip.com
description: Leading OTA in China (as Ctrip) with expanding global presence, offering flights, hotels, trains, and tours.

name: Momondo.com
description: Travel meta-search engine known for its broad search and colorful interface. Owned by Booking Holdings.

name: LonelyPlanet.com
description: Iconic travel guide publisher offering destination information, travel tips, and inspiration.

name: Conde Nast Traveler
description: Luxury travel magazine and website offering aspirational content, reviews, and destination guides.

name: Travel + Leisure
description: Influential travel magazine and website focusing on destinations, hotels, food, and lifestyle.

name: ThePointsGuy.com
description: Authoritative source for travel rewards, loyalty programs, credit cards, and maximizing points/miles.

name: National Geographic Travel
description: Focuses on photography, cultural insights, adventure, and sustainable travel.

name: Viator.com
description: Leading platform for booking tours, activities, and attractions worldwide. Owned by TripAdvisor.

name: GetYourGuide.com
description: Platform for discovering and booking tours, activities, and attractions.

name: Priceline.com
description: OTA known for its 'Name Your Own Price' model and discount travel deals. Part of Booking Holdings.

name: Hostelworld.com
description: Leading online booking platform for hostels worldwide.

name: CruiseCritic.com
description: Comprehensive cruise review site with community forums and booking information.

name: Skift.com
description: Leading source for travel industry news, research, and intelligence.

name: Phocuswire.com
description: Focuses on travel technology, distribution, and digital trends in the travel industry.

name: Fodors.com
description: Long-standing travel guide publisher offering destination advice and travel tips.

name: Orbitz.com
description: OTA offering flights, hotels, cars, and packages, known for its rewards program. Part of Expedia Group.

name: Travelocity.com
description: Well-known OTA for booking flights, hotels, cars, and vacation packages. Part of Expedia Group.

name: Hotwire.com
description: Discount travel site offering opaque deals on hotels, flights, and cars. Part of Expedia Group.

name: Rentalcars.com
description: Major online car rental booking service. Part of Booking Holdings.

name: US Department of State - Travel
description: Official source for US travel advisories, passport, and visa information.

name: GOV.UK - Foreign travel advice
description: Official source for UK government travel advisories and safety information.

name: Rome2Rio.com
description: Helps discover how to get anywhere by plane, train, bus, ferry, and car.

name: Klook.com
description: Platform for booking travel activities, attractions, and local experiences, strong in Asia.

name: NomadicMatt.com
description: Popular budget travel blog with tips, advice, and destination guides.

name: Scott's Cheap Flights (Going.com)
description: Subscription service and website that finds and alerts members to cheap flight deals.

name: Marriott.com
description: Official site for Marriott Bonvoy hotels, for booking and loyalty program management.

name: Hilton.com
description: Official site for Hilton Worldwide hotels, for booking and Hilton Honors program.

name: IHG.com
description: Official site for InterContinental Hotels Group, for booking and IHG Rewards.

name: AmericanAirlines.com (aa.com)
description: Official website for American Airlines, for bookings and AAdvantage loyalty program.

name: Delta.com
description: Official website for Delta Air Lines, for bookings and SkyMiles loyalty program.

name: United.com
description: Official website for United Airlines, for bookings and MileagePlus loyalty program.

name: AtlasObscura.com
description: Guide to the world's wondrous and curious places, offering unique travel inspiration and trips.

name: RickSteves.com
description: Authoritative resource for European travel, with guidebooks, tours, TV shows, and travel tips.

name: MakeMyTrip.com
description: Leading online travel company in India, offering flights, hotels, holiday packages, and more.

name: Despegar.com / Decolar.com
description: Leading online travel company in Latin America (Despegar in Spanish-speaking countries, Decolar in Brazil).

name: SecretFlying.com
description: Finds and shares exceptionally cheap flight deals and error fares from around the world.

name: Trainline.com
description: Leading independent retailer of train and coach tickets, strong in Europe.

name: InsureMyTrip.com
description: Comparison site for travel insurance plans from various providers.

name: SleepingInAirports.net
description: Provides airport reviews, guides on sleeping in airports, airport lounges, and general airport information.
